High Desert Sonnets

The client had spent 1 month in the New Mexico desert writing sonnets. When he came home, he approached Simple Story to help with the creation of videos and branding for the project to eventually share his work and story with family and friends.

In February, over 500 guests gathered at the National Arts Centre for an evening of poetry accompanied by videos. I had the pleasure of designing the event branding and materials for the evening.

The client had spent 1 month in the New Mexico desert writting sonnets. When he came home, he approached Simple Story to help with the creation of videos and branding for the project to eventually share his work and story with family and friends.
